name: Cricket Star Pro
description:
Take your footing in front of the stumps and protect the wickets in this thrilling game of cricket, all from your home without ever having to leave the 22 yards.

Rise your team to victory from grass roots by scoring big, and staying in. Starting as a rookie batsman, make it big in the leagues by nailing the timing of your swing to score.

Do you have the talent to make it big in the leagues of Cricket Star Pro?

Cricket Star Pro features:
-Complete objectives to progress to the next match
-Score big for your team
-Re-create the thrill of a live stadium
-Become the Champion of your domain
